Title: Professional Construction Services
Description:
This tender is for the provision of professional services associated with the construction, maintenance and repair of social housing, commercial units and corporate properties. 
We are keen to broaden our Â£2.25 billion development portfolio to include a significant volume of MMC (modern methods of construction) and OSM (off site manufacturing) and are therefore seeking bids from suitably qualified and experienced consultancy practices. Our development programmes will also have traditional build and commercial building requirements. 
Bidders are invited to tender for one or more of the lots. Services will be called off from the framework as and when required by members and users via mini-competition.
Full details of the lots available are available via the Westworks e-procurement portal at the address stated in this notice.
Contact Address 1: Sarsen Court, Horton Avenue, Cannings Hill,

Title: Hall For Cornwall Measured Building Survey
Description:
The Hall For Cornwall Trust is preparing for a major renovation of the building including a new auditorium and new uses in some of the internal spaces. The project will include creating a new front of house, back of house and auditorium with new culture sector facilities.  

The building has been recently surveyed over an extended period of time.  Unfortunately the survey was not completed in line with the specified requirements and a new survey is to been commissioned. It is important for the project that the 2D drawings are produced in line with standard architectural conventions and are carefully checked.  The building is complex with a series of split levels across the 3 primary sections of the site.
